member.name: MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_MODE
member.summary: Defines when a transform in a topology is flushed.

member.name: MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_MODE.MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_ALWAYS
member.summary: The transform is flushed whenever the stream changes, including seeks and new segments.

member.name: MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_MODE.MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_SEEK
member.summary: The transform is flushed when seeking is performed on the stream.

member.name: MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_MODE.MF_TOPONODE_FLUSH_NEVER
member.summary: The transform is never flushed during streaming. It is flushed only when the object is released.
